MedicationTherapyReview.name: MedicationTherapyReview
MedicationTherapyReview.description: Stores information about a medication therapy review conducted for a patient.

CareProgramId.description: The care program associated with the medication therapy review.

ConductedById.description: The user who started the medication therapy review for the patient.

Description.description: A description of the medication therapy review conducted for the patient.

IsPatientInLtrmCareFacility.description: Indicates whether the patient was at a long-term healthcare facility during the medication therapy review.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced the record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed the record.

Name.description: The name of the medication therapy review.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns the record.

PatientId.description: The patient on whom the medication therapy review is conducted.

ReviewDueDateTime.description: The date and time when the medication therapy review is expected to complete.

ReviewEndDateTime.description: The date and time when the medication therapy review is complete.

ReviewStartDateTime.description: The date and time when the medication therapy review is initiated.

ReviewSubtype.description: A further classification of the medication therapy review type.

ReviewType.description: The type of medication therapy review conducted for the patient.

SourceSysModifiedDateTime.description: The date and time when the record was last modified in its source system.

SourceSystem.description: The source system from where the record was brought into Salesforce.

SourceSystemIdentifier.description: The identifier of the record in its source system.

Status.description: The current status of the medication therapy review.

SurrogateDecisionMakerId.description: The authorized representative who attends the medication therapy review and makes health-care related decisions on behalf of a cognitively impaired patient.

SurrogateLocationId.description: The address of the surrogate decision maker where the comprehensive medication review document is delivered.

SurrogateType.description: The relationship between the surrogate decision maker and the patient.
